setConfig

public void setConfig(NetworkDriverConfiguration config)
Description copied from class: BaseNetworkDriver
Called once at initialization. Sets configuration members for later use. use this method to extract all necessary information needed for future provisioning calls.

Overrides:

Parameters:

public String allocateFloatingIP(String poolName,
                                 Map<String,Object> context,
                                 long duration,
                                 TimeUnit timeUnit)
                          throws NetworkProvisioningException,
                                 TimeoutException
Description copied from class: BaseNetworkDriver
Reserves a floating IP address from the available blocks of floating IP addresses.

Overrides:
allocateFloatingIP in class BaseNetworkDriver
Parameters:
poolName - The pool name from which to allocate the floating IP address.
context - context properties.
duration - duration until times out.
timeUnit - the duration timeout units.
Returns:
The reserved IP address.
Throws:
NetworkProvisioningException - If allocation fails.
TimeoutException - If execution exceeds duration.
